title: Package Solution Task Configuration
description: Defines parameters for task which creates the SharePoint Package

packageDir.title: Base Package Directory
packageDir.description: The packaging root folder. Defaults to './sharepoint'

debugDir.title: Debug Directory
debugDir.description: The folder to write the raw package to disk for debugging. Defaults to 'solution/debug'

zippedPackage.title: Zipped Package Name
zippedPackage.description: The name of the sppkg to create (including extension) Defaults to 'ClientSolution.sppkg'

featureXmlDir.title: Feature XML Directory
featureXmlDir.description: The folder containing the raw feature_xml to import into the package. Defaults to 'feature_xml'

manifestsMatch.title: Manifests Match Pattern
manifestsMatch.description: The glob to match against to find manifest files. Looks in dist/ when running in normal, but deploy/ for production

manifestDir.title: Manifest Directory
manifestDir.description: The path to the folder where manifests are stored. Defaults to buildConfig.distFolder

name.title: Name
name.description: Non localized name to identify the package

id.title: Name
id.description: A GUID identifier for this particular package

title.title: Title
title.description: Localizable string for the title of the package. Can either be a non-localized string, or `$Resources:<stringId>;` if localized resources are provided for the package through a .resx file

supportedLocales.title: Supported Locales
supportedLocales.description: The list of cultures which this package can be used with. Follows LL-CC for each locale.

version.title: Version
version.description: Version of the package, may not match with the version of the components.

iconPath.title: Icon Path
iconPath.description: Relative path to the icon file. Base path is the base package directory.

features.description: If omitted, a feature will be created to contain the components.

id.title: ID
id.description: A GUID identifier for this Feature

componentIds.title: The GUIDs of components which should be included in this feature. If omitted, all components will be included in this feature.

elementFiles.title: A list of element filenames.
elementFiles.description: Any supported files that accompany the element manifest will be an element file. For example, the list instance schema is an element manifest that is associated with a list instance that is defined in an element manifest.

elementManifests.title: A list of element manifest filenames.

upgradeActions.title: A list of upgrade action filenames.
